Name: Route Network Crisis Part II
Description: Once again, Outcast activity is reported near the route network. You suspect the situation may be more complex than it seems...
QuestDesc: Once again, Outcast activity is reported near the route network. You suspect the situation may be more complex than it seems...

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (The Spacetrek–Bjartr Bridge is close to the Bjartr Woods. If Outcasts have become bold enough to cause trouble there... something's not right.)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (I should head to Spacetrek–Bjartr Bridge. I can't let the Outcasts stir up trouble in the Bjartr Woods.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Outcast
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Backup's here already?! Then we'll just have to force our way through!

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why are you out here again right after another warning message from the Route Network Office? That can't just be a coincidence.

Dialogues.Speaker: Macknay
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I know, right? It's way too much of a coincidence. And I still don't get how those Outcasts know about our transport schedules...

Dialogues.Speaker: Macknay
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't tell me they're actually targeting a nobody driver like me… No way, right?!

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll talk to the Spacetrek Collective about route network security. You don't need to be so on edge.

Dialogues.Speaker: Macknay
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You will? I knew you weren't just some ordinary traveler, didn't expect you to have that kind of pull.

Dialogues.Speaker: Macknay
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then I'll get back to work. Thanks again for swooping in to save me!
